text: Ishwari Prasad Gupta (5 February 1931 in Arrah - 12 December 2018 in Delhi) was an Indian politician. He was a Joint Secretary to the Government of India, Ministry of Home Affairs (India), Chief Secretary to the Government of Tripura and Lt. Governor of Andaman and Nicobar Islands. == References == Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Lieutenant governors of the Andaman and Nicobar Islands
title: Ishwari Prasad Gupta
